Introduction
This topic contains information on readjudicating previously decided claims upon request, including
requesting readjudication of a previously decided claim
form requirements for claim readjudication
Section 5103 requirements
duty to assist and claim reviews
, and
handling requests to review a determination regarding new and relevant evidence
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Revision Based on Specific Types of Submissions, Including Supplemental Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
